name: Bad Crowding
description: This game is a traffic control game It was made in 3 days by two people The idea of the game is as follows: You are a policeman, and the call to prayer for Maghrib is approaching, and the hours are ticking And people break the laws because of their urgency to return to their homes As a policeman, we join the traffic by controlling the traffic lights so that all people can reach their homes before the call to prayer without any problems. This asets was used in the game: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack https://www.kenney.nl/assets/emotes-pack this game is a submission to theRamadan Development Nights  gamejam how to play : You press R to restart the saliva Click on the traffic light to change its color If it is green, the cars next to it will pass If it is red, cars stop next to it how to win : You have to manage the traffic so that there is no accident until Morocco is authorized
